Articles.Content: My pyro uses his rainblower to turn the Arctic Wind into confetti.
Jebediah Kerman (our glorious leader, all hail his BadSness) crashes into your pyro, obliterating him.
Knight to C4. Knight to detonator control. Knight with C4 and detonator to opponent's side. Knight detonates C4. Now use a fortune teller thing to tell how big the blast was.
I turn off my cloaking device and reveal that it was merely a decoy that was destroyed. I then send my best tanks forward and send my hunters off for DPS.
My pieces jump in their Formula One cars and make a quick getaway using their DRS.
I fire an EMP and then nuke the chessboard. I then create a new one with no pieces on it. It's also made of ice.
I reload my previous save before the nuke went off.
I deploy my MCV and build a base. And then send a bunch of tanks to your other base.
I send an airstrike to your tanks....
A good effort, but now it's time for my own entry in the fireworks contest.

I'm sorry...

I put out all already burning fires and coat everything in water, foam and CO2. You are now unable to combust anything at all ever.
I may not be able to combust, but boy will I use my ukulele and win the talent contest!
I move my knight and attempt to take your ukulele.
My engineer steals your ukulele, attempts to play it, then smashes it into the ground.
My Meta Knight "Smashes" your engineer.
My global hawk is deployed one click above the target area, and engages AP1 CIRC. TO locks FLIR ball onto target. Pilot calls RIFLE, two hellfires smash your metanight to dust.
Fox does a barrel role then shoots down your global hawk.
Queen to Rogue 5, launches proton torpedoes into thermal exhaust port

Nothing happens because combustion is no longer possible for some time.

I take your rook, put it in a bottle, and throw it out into the river.
Humanity uses Global warming, drying out the river, saving the Rook. As a retaliation move I call in The Whackjob.
I take my mallet and whack-a-mole all your pieces into holes under their board squares.
I draw an O in one square. One more and I'll have three in a row.
I pick up that ring and skilfully toss it over an opposing pawn, scoring a point.
I use that point to summon Solid Snake, who infects your queen with the Syphon Filter virus.
I run Malwarebytes on my queen. Then I run Furmark on your queen.
